name: vgn-prices
description: A simple web scraper to extract prices from !(`www.vgn.de/tickets`)[https://www.vgn.de/tickets/] to JSON, CSV and Markdown.

scripts.markdown: rm prices.md && printf "# Prices\n\n" > prices.md && cat prices.json | ./node_modules/.bin/md-table >> prices.md

author: Francis Doege
